long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension for AquaCloud. Adds a button to the section "test scenario" → "test cases". Selected test cases will be executed by a running mateo instance, in the selected order.

Once execution has finished, a report is added to the respective Aqua test case.

In case of an execution error, extensive information will be added to the respective test step.

In case mateo cannot find a required file, an error message is displayed.

Documentation is avaiable through mateo under "Reporting" → "External Reporters - Aqua": https://mateo-documentation.demo.viadee.cloud/#/documentation/usermanual

To see the extension in action, feel free to check out our blog post: https://www.mateo-automation.com/post/der-neue-mateo-aqua-reporter

mateo is a test and process automation tool powered by viadee (https://www.viadee.de). Get a free trial at https://mateo-automation.com.
